  • Method Details

    • courseStrMatcher

      public static boolean courseStrMatcher​(java.lang.String courseInput)
      Checks if course string input is in the correct format.
      Parameters:
      courseInput - String that stores value to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean value if given input's first 2 characters are letters, and next 4 are digits, true if valid

    • indexStrMatcher

      public static boolean indexStrMatcher​(java.lang.String indexInput)
      Checks if index input is in the correct format.
      Parameters:
      indexInput - String that stores value to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean value if given index is a 6-digit value, true if valid

    • validateDateTimeInput

      public static boolean validateDateTimeInput​(java.lang.String dateTimeStr)
      Checks if date time string input is in the correct format.
      Parameters:
      dateTimeStr - String that stores value to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean value if given input is a valid date time, true if valid

    • validateNameInput

      public static boolean validateNameInput​(java.lang.String nameStr)
      Checks if name input is in an acceptable format.
      Parameters:
      nameStr - String that stores value to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean value if given name input does not contain a number, true if valid

    • validateTimeInput

      public static boolean validateTimeInput​(java.lang.String timeStr)
      Checks if time input is in the correct format.
      Parameters:
      timeStr - String that stores value to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean value if given time input is in HH:MM 24-hour format, true if valid

    • validateTimeInput

      public static boolean validateTimeInput​(java.lang.String timeStr, java.lang.String schoolStartTime, java.lang.String schoolEndTime, int duration)
      Checks if time input value is within school hours.
      Parameters:
      timeStr - String that stores time input value to be checked
      schoolStartTime - String that stores opening time of school
      schoolEndTime - String that stores closing time of school
      duration - Integer that stores duration of class
      Returns:
      boolean value if given time input is within earliest and latest times of school opening hours, true if valid
